pages.index: Handmade Jewels - Unique Indian Handcrafted Jewelry About us FAQs Contact Us Our story +91-041-7293513 handmadejewels@gmail.com Welcome to HandmadeJewels Exquisite Handmade Jewelry from India Discover the elegance of unique, handcrafted jewelry made with love and care by skilled artisans in India. Each piece tells a story of tradition and beauty, perfect for enhancing your personal style. About HandmadeJewels Welcome to HandmadeJewels, your premier destination for exquisite handmade jewelry crafted with passion and precision in India. Our journey began with a love for the rich cultural heritage and artisanal skills that have been passed down through generations. We are committed to bringing you unique pieces that not only enhance your style but also carry a story of tradition and craftsmanship. At HandmadeJewels, we work closely with talented artisans who infuse their creativity and expertise into every piece of jewelry. Our collection features a diverse range of designs, from timeless classics to contemporary creations, ensuring there is something for everyone. Whether you are looking for intricate necklaces, elegant earrings, stunning bracelets, or statement rings, each item is made with high-quality materials and meticulous attention to detail. We believe in the power of handmade jewelry to make a statement and celebrate individuality. Our pieces are not mass-produced; they are thoughtfully designed and handcrafted, making each one truly unique. By choosing HandmadeJewels, you are supporting skilled artisans and their families, helping to preserve traditional techniques and contribute to sustainable livelihoods. FAQs What materials are used in HandmadeJewels jewelry? Our jewelry is crafted using a variety of high-quality materials including sterling silver, gold, semi-precious stones, and traditional Indian materials. Each piece is carefully selected to ensure durability and beauty. How do I care for my HandmadeJewels jewelry? To maintain the beauty of your jewelry, avoid exposure to moisture, chemicals, and direct sunlight. Store each piece separately in a jewelry box or pouch to prevent scratches. Clean with a soft cloth to keep your jewelry looking its best. Do you offer international shipping? Yes, we offer international shipping to many countries. Shipping costs and delivery times vary depending on the destination. Please check our shipping policy for more details. Can I customize a piece of jewelry? Absolutely! We offer customization options for many of our jewelry pieces. If you have a specific design in mind or want to personalize an item, please contact us at handmadejewels@gmail.com and we will be happy to assist you. Our jewelry Contact Us We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have a question about our products or need assistance, we're here to help. I accept Privacy policy At HandmadeJewels, we value our customers and are dedicated to providing exceptional service. If you have any inquiries about our handcrafted jewelry or need support with your order, please feel free to reach out. You can contact us directly through this form, and we will respond as soon as possible. Alternatively, you can email us at handmadejewels@gmail.com. We appreciate your interest in our unique pieces and look forward to assisting you. Our Story HandmadeJewels began its journey in 2011 in the vibrant and culturally rich landscapes of India. Founded by Anjali Mehra with a deep appreciation for traditional craftsmanship and a passion for creating exquisite jewelry, we set out to bring the beauty of handmade pieces to a global audience. Anjali, inspired by the intricate artistry of local artisans, decided to create a platform that celebrates and preserves the unique skills passed down through generations. Each piece of jewelry from HandmadeJewels is a testament to the dedication and talent of our artisans, combining age-old techniques with contemporary designs. Read more Craftsmanship Excellence At HandmadeJewels, we pride ourselves on the superior quality of our craftsmanship. Each piece is meticulously crafted by skilled artisans, ensuring that every item is unique and of the highest standard. Global Recognition Since our inception in 2011, HandmadeJewels has received numerous accolades for our exceptional designs and quality. Our jewelry has been featured in international fashion magazines and worn by celebrities worldwide. Sustainable Practices We are committed to sustainable and ethical practices. Our materials are sourced responsibly, and we ensure that our artisans work in fair conditions, preserving the environment and supporting the community. Customer Satisfaction Our greatest achievement is the satisfaction of our customers. We strive to provide exceptional service and ensure that every customer is delighted with their HandmadeJewels experience. Home Privacy policy Terms of Use
pages.privacy: Privacy Policy | HandmadeJewels About us FAQs Contact Us Our story +91-041-7293513 handmadejewels@gmail.com Privacy Policy We at Handmade Jewels are committed to safeguarding the privacy of our website visitors and service users. This Privacy Policy outlines the manner in which we collect, use, and protect your personal information. Information Collection When you visit our website, we may collect, store, and use the following kinds of personal information: Information about your computer and about your visits to and use of this website, such as your IP address, geographical location, browser type, referral source, length of visit, and pages viewed. Information that you provide to us when registering with our website, subscribing to our email notifications, and/or placing an order, such as your name, email address, postal address, and phone number. Using Your Personal Information Personal information submitted to us through our website will be used for the purposes specified in this Privacy Policy or on the relevant pages of the website. We may use your personal information to: Administer our website and business. Personalize our website for you. Enable your use of the services available on our website. Supply you with goods purchased through our website. Send you email notifications that you have specifically requested. Send you our email newsletter, if you have requested it (you can inform us at any time if you no longer require the newsletter). Send you marketing communications relating to our business or the businesses of carefully-selected third parties which we think may be of interest to you, by post or, where you have specifically agreed to this, by email or similar technology (you can inform us at any time if you no longer require marketing communications). Security of Your Personal Information We will take reasonable technical and organizational precautions to prevent the loss, misuse, or alteration of your personal information. We will store all the personal information you provide on our secure servers. Policy Amendments We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time by posting a new version on our website. You should check this page occasionally to ensure you are happy with any changes. Your Rights You may instruct us to provide you with any personal information we hold about you. Provision of such information may be subject to the payment of a fee. You may instruct us not to process your personal information for marketing purposes. Contact If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our treatment of your personal information, please write to us by email to handmadejewels@gmail.com. Home Privacy policy Terms of Use
pages.terms: Terms and Conditions | HandmadeJewels About us FAQs Contact Us Our story +91-041-7293513 handmadejewels@gmail.com Terms of Service Welcome to Handmade Jewels. Use of Website The content of the pages of this website is for your general information and use only. It is subject to change without notice. Reproduction is prohibited other than in accordance with the copyright notice, which forms part of these terms and conditions. Unauthorized Use Unauthorized use of this website may give rise to a claim for damages and/or be a criminal offense. Links to Other Websites Our website may contain links to other websites of interest. However, once you have used these links to leave our site, you should note that we do not have any control over that other website. Therefore, we cannot be responsible for the protection and privacy of any information which you provide whilst visiting such sites and such sites are not governed by this privacy statement. You should exercise caution and look at the privacy statement applicable to the website in question. Disclaimer Your use of any information or materials on this website is entirely at your own risk, for which we shall not be liable. It shall be your own responsibility to ensure that any products, services, or information available through this website meet your specific requirements. Changes to Terms We may revise these terms of use at any time without notice. By using this website you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these terms of use. Contact If you have any questions about these Terms of Service, please contact us by email at handmadejewels@gmail.com. Home Privacy policy Terms of Use
